bibl.title: Consilium et ratio? Papyrus A of Bacchylides and Alexandrian Metrical Scholarship.
bibl.note: I. Snell's hypothesis [about the colometry of the Bacchylides papyri: Bruno SNELL (post Fridericum BLASS et Guilelmum SUESS quintum edidit), Bacchylidis carmina cum fragmentis (Lipsiae, 1934), p. 31*]. - II. Alexandrian knowledge of metre and music. - III. Alexandrian colometry. - Conclusion.
PARKER L.P.E., Consilium et ratio? Papyrus A of Bacchylides and Alexandrian Metrical Scholarship.
